Actions.Name: Savage Swipes
Actions.Effects: If there's only one valid character in range, deals bonus damage.

Actions.Name: Bounding Leaps
Actions.Effects: If it lands on an object or adjacent to a character, it can repeat this flight once more.

Actions.Name: Pounce
Actions.Description: The [name] flies 4, then an adjacent foe is dazed and must save or take [D]+[fray], twice, or [fray] on a successful save.
